thread.title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology To Boost Unit's Registered Capital By 500 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology To Boost Unit's Registered Capital By 500 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: hikvision digital technology to boost unit
hangzhou hikvision digital technology co ltd

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BOOST CHONGQING UNIT'S REGISTERED CAPITAL BY 500 MILLION YUAN ($79.84 million) TO 700 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FQrBgv Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2625 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
